overview: After being cursed by his ex-girlfriend Lakeisha, serial womanizer Rodney Smalls is in for the most horrifying night of his life. Fighting for survival and not knowing the true horror that awaits him, Rodney is haunted by a demonic presence throughout the darkness. This insane horror-comedy is from the crazy mind of writer-director Dwayne Hurt (“Cedonia Avenue”) and features chilling make-up effects.
title: Scared Crazy
